item.description:
The movie was changed to Maldeamores. It is a nice little comedy. I've seen it, so I may or may not see it again.

It's the monthly First Thursday at the Wadsworth Atheneum. $5.00 entry fee for the party also includes the free movie. Just the movie is $9.00. Good drinks, several other meetup groups also attend. The Party starts @ 5:00 pm and the movie starts at 8:00 pm.


Maldeamores
An award-winning comedy that examines the ironies of love, with stories that involve a young boy, a hostage situation, and a divorced elderly couple caught in a love triangle.

2007. Puerto Rico. 81 min. Rated R. Subtitles. Directed by Carlitos Ruiz Ruiz and Mariem Pérez Riera. Starring Luis Guzmán.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be there at both the Party and the movie.

group.name: Beyond the Multiplex: Hartford's Indie and Foreign Film fans

item.name: First Thursday @ the Wadsworth and movie - Maldeamores
